info.title: Apps Legacy API v1
info.description: Legacy v1 Platform API endpoints for apps domain

get.description: Retrieve a list of available apps. **Available for Staff and Directory Tokens**.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource.

post.description: Create a new app. **Available for Directory Tokens**.

app_code_name.description: The app's unique code name. This will be used as the app's id for APIS

app_type.description: Define a list of integration points the app implements. Valid values are: payments, wallets, communication, menu_items, docuforms, import_clients, automated_flows, signatures, onboarding_wizard, notifications. More information can be found in the guides section of the developer hub

redirect_uri.description: The app's main landing page. The platform will use this URI when opening the app's iframe.

trusted.description: Whether application can skip the user consent screen (true/false). When set to true, users will not see the authorization consent screen when installing or accessing the app.

url_params.description: Parameters that will be passed to the app in the app's iframe query string. Valid values are: impersonate, business_uid, staff_role, staff_uid, payment_permissions, language, package, brand_host

menu_items.description: When app is installed, these items will be added to the left sidebar menu. If not provided, the app will not be displayed in the left sidebar menu. app_type must include 'menu_items' to use this property.

category.description: Section of the left menu in which the item will appear. Valid values are: ["calendar", "clients", "payments", "inbox", "documents", "campaigns", "reputation", "my-livesite", "social", "social_info", "app_market", "reports", "team-chat", "advertising", "subscriptions", "my_account", "cashflow", "workforce", "setupguide", "reviews", "social_media", "online_listing"]

permissions.description: Permissions to control who can view this menu item. Available permissions: ["can_access_listings_management", "can_access_soci", "can_access_online_presence", "can_access_clients", "can_use_reports", "can_view_payments", "can_view_documents", "has_marketing_permissions", "can_access_admin_account", "can_access_settings", "can_export_payments"]

route.description: Suffix route relative to the app domain.

display_order.description: Display order of the menu item withihn the category. Start from 0. If not provided, will be added to the end of the category.

block_impersonation.description: Whether the menu item should be blocked when an operator is impersonating as a staff member

open_in_new_tab.description: Whether the app will be opened in a new tab or as an iframe

full_screen.description: Whether the app will be opened in a full screen mode, taking over the page header but leaving the sidebar and topbar visible

name.description: [App Market] The app's name as it will be displayed in the app market. Must be 3 to 25 chars long. If translations are required, use the app translations API

description.description: [App Market] The app's description. This is displayed in the app info page in the app market.

short_description.description: The app's short description. Should contain a summarize review of the app's purpose and functions. Max length is 260 chars.

text.description: The app's long description. Should describe the app's functions in detail. Max length is 380 chars.

app_features.description: [App Market] A list of the app's features. Will be displayed to the user in the app info page in the app market. Max 10 features. Max feature length is 500 chars.

app_screenshot_uris.description: [App Market] Links to app screenshots or demo videos. Displayed on the desktop App info page in the app market. Each asset must be 608 × 272 px. Supported formats: GIF, PNG, JPEG, MJPEG, SVG, MP4, WebM, OGV.

app_mobile_screenshot_uris.description: [App Market] Links to app screenshots or demo videos. Displayed on the mobile App info page in the app market. Each asset must be 608 × 272 px. Supported formats: GIF, PNG, JPEG, MJPEG, SVG, MP4, WebM, OGV.

contact_support_link.description: [App Market] Link to the app's contact support page. This is displayed in the app info page in the app market.

locales.description: [App Market] Locales supported by the app in the app market. If supplied it will be shown for the users in the app market. Valid values are: 'en', 'he', 'es', 'pl', 'fr', 'it', 'pt', 'de', 'nl', 'en-GB', 'zh-SG', 'keys', 'pseudo'

payment_data.description: [App Market] Payment data for the app. Will be displayed in the app info page

pay_per_unit.description: The units available in this purchasable for extra payment

currency.description: Currency, allowed only: USD, GBP or EUR

privacy_policy_link.description: [App Market] A link to the apps privacy policy. This is displayed in the app info page in the app market.

personal_connection.description: [App Market] Use to determine if each staff needs to connect separately to the app.

supported_countries.description: Countries in which the app will be available. Empty array for all countries.

api_uri.description: [Internal use only] The URL of the application API. This is required for apps that implement integration points like Calendar. This is mainly for internal use. For further details contact the support team.

app_layer.description: [Internal use only] The layer of the application. Valid values are: cores, connectors, integrations, widgets, boards. This is mainly for internal use. For further details contact the support team.

deep_link.description: [Internal use only] The deep link to an inner product page. This is not made for third-party apps, but for apps that open as part of the product. Made for internal developer use only.

path.description: The relative path to the page.

path_params.description: The params that will be added to the path URL (optional)

scopes.description: [Internal use only] Reserved for future implementation. Intended to define the complete set of OAuth scopes that this app type can potentially request or use. Currently not enforced in the system. For further details contact the support team.

demand_scopes.description: [Internal use only] Reserved for future implementation. Intended to define the minimum required OAuth scopes that this app type must have to function properly. Currently not enforced in the system. For further details contact the support team.

access_token_format.description: Format of access tokens issued for this app. Determines whether tokens are opaque or JWT.

client_auth_jwks_uri.description: The client_auth_jwks_uri property lets you authenticate with our OAuth service using JWT signed tokens instead of a client_secret. In the OAuth token request, the service will choose the correct authentication method based on the provided parameters. To use client authentication with Private Key JWT, this property must be set. The URI should return a JSON Web Key Set containing your public keys. The service will retrieve this JWKS and use the keys to verify the JWT you provide.

open_channel.description: Indicator for communication app if it enables direct, sessionless messaging without requiring pre-established channel sessions.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid input data or missing required fields.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. Only Directory Tokens can create apps.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Validation failed (e.g., app_code_name already exists).

get.description: Retrieve an app by code name. **Available for Directory Tokens**.

description.short_description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
description.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam, purus sit amet luctus venenatis, lectus magna fringilla urna, porttitor rhoncus dolor purus non enim praesent elementum facilisis leo, vel fringilla est ullamcorper eget.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. Only Directory Tokens can access app details.

404.description: Not Found. App with specified code name does not exist.

put.description: Update an app by code name. **Available for Directory Tokens**.

In the OAuth token request, the service will choose the correct authentication method based on the provided parameters. To use client authentication with Private Key JWT, this property must be set. The URI should return a JSON Web Key Set containing your public keys. The service will retrieve this JWKS and use the keys to verify the JWT you provide.

oauth_redirect_uris.description: An array of URLs to redirect the user to after a successful login.

description.short_description: This is the app's short description. A quick summary of the app's uses.
description.text: This is the app's long description. It should describe the app's uses and benefits in detail.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. Only Directory Tokens can update apps.

404.description: Not Found. App with specified code name does not exist.

post.description: Assign an application to a business or directory so it appears in the App Market. **Available for Internal & Directory Tokens**.

built_in.description: Define the app as built_in for this directory, meaning it is installed for all its users and cannot be uninstalled by them. Used with directory_uid only.

business_uid.description: The business uid to associate the app to.

directory_uid.description: The directory uid to associate the app to.

is_internal.description: Specify that the app is an internal - used with directory_uid only.

pre_installed.description: Define the app as pre-installed for all new accounts of this directory - used with directory_uid only.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. Only Internal or Directory Tokens can assign apps.

404.description: Not Found. App or target entity not found.

post.summary: Assign an app on directory or a business [Internal] - Deprecated, /v3/apps/app_assignments instead

post.description: Install an app for the authorized business. **Available for Staff Tokens**.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. Only Staff Tokens can install apps.

404.description: Not Found. App not found or not available for this business.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. App is already installed.

post.description: Unassign an application from a business or directory. **Available for Internal & Directory Tokens**.

business_uid.description: The business uid to associate the app to.

directory_uid.description: The directory uid to associate the app to.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. Only Internal or Directory Tokens can unassign apps.

404.description: Not Found. App assignment not found.

post.summary: Unassign an app on directory or a business [Internal]

post.description: Uninstall an app for the authorized business. **Available for Staff Tokens**.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. Only Staff Tokens can uninstall apps.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. App is not installed.
